caption: Hey everyone, just 3 days left to enter my competition to see Shawn Mendes live at London's O2 Shepherds Bush next week. All you have to do to enter is 'like' this (or last weeks competition post) and 'tag' two friends in the comments below. And you can enter as many times as you like. I will be picking a winner at random on the 11th September at 8pm. The competition is open to anyone 14 and over but if, like me, you are under 14, you must be accompanied by someone over 18. Good luck xoxo - for further t&c's visit http://goo.gl/cZtK5S #ShawnMendes #London #LiveMusic #ShawnMendesArmy
